item.description:
This event was founded by Boston Herald Columnist Steve Buckley.

See facebook and the site for details:[url=http://www.oldtimebaseball.com/] and updates.

  http://www.oldtimebaseball.com/[/url].

 The Annual Injured Workers Pharmacy Old Time Baseball Game will take place on Monday, August 13 at 7pm in St. Peters Field North Cambridge. What makes the Old Time Baseball Game so special is its dazzling collections of old uniforms that represent virtually every era in baseball history. The game offers a glimpse of what it was like in the old days. This years game is being played as a benefit for the Red Cross. Admission is free. Food and memorabilia will be available for purchase. Fans are asked to bring a lawn chair and camp out along the foul lines. 

Donations are welcome.

Allow extra time for commute and parking as this event draws a huge crowd.
item.how_to_find_us: Natives E Mail & Coordinate with each other
item.name: Old Time Baseball Game at St. Peter's Field, North Cambridge
